resources.string:
1. Fast scrolling is supported: Swipe right to left and up/down. Quick navigation to the start or end of the file is available by tapping the top or bottom right corners.
2. Fast copying is supported: Long press anywhere + "ALL" button. Quick text deletion is also available: "ALL" + "DELETE" (on the keyboard).
3. Editing very large files can be resource-intensive depending on the device. However, for most scenarios (up to 100,000 characters or more), no issues typically arise.
4. After changing syntax highlighting settings, it is recommended to restart the application.
5. Data protection is implemented based on the AES algorithm in GCM mode with HMAC-SHA256 and PBKDF2 (75,000 iterations). Using a random and sufficiently complex password ensures a high level of protection. Important: A weak password negates all cryptographic measures, so for corporate or sensitive data, use strong passwords, preferably generated and stored in a password manager.
6. This editor is part of the Syndes ecosystem. Use for work tasks is permitted and not restricted by the license. The project is free and distributed with open source.
7. Disclaimer: The developers are not responsible for any consequences of using the editor. We strive to provide the most reliable software, but 100% stability cannot be guaranteed. Regular file backups significantly reduce the risk of data loss.
